imdb.plot outline: Let's say you want to prepare a dinner among friends. And let's say you also are very good in setting your cosy home, your dinner table and preparing a wonderful dinner in perfect style. Why not use your skills in a contest? "Cortesie per gli Ospiti" is a tv program where the two protagonists, together with their most trustful fellow, have the chance to compete against each other using their skills as host and chef. Their ability is judged by the invited guests and, in particular, by 3 experts that will take part in both dinners and will declare the winner.

Their ability is judged by the invited guests and, in particular, by 3 experts that will take part in both dinners and will declare the winner.::Anonymous
synopsis:
Let's say you want to prepare a dinner among friends. And let's say you also are very good in setting your cosy home, your dinner table and preparing a wonderful dinner in perfect style.
Why not use your skills in a contest?
"Cortesie per gli Ospiti" is a tv program where the two protagonists, together with their most trustful fellow, have the chance to compete against each other using their skills as host and chef.
Their ability is judged by the invited guests and, in particular , by 3 experts that, after taking part in both dinners, will declare the winner.
